author: SciShow
description:
Visit https://brilliant.org/scishow/ to get started learning STEM for free and get 20% off their annual premium subscription.

The Inca Empire used bundles of knotted string called khipu to store and convey information. But how do you read a bunch of strings? And was this a unique form of writing... or knot?

Hosted by: Stefan Chin

title: The Inca Used This To Write Without Words
